snippet: PERLMUTTER--Leila Herman, 79. Adored wife of Alfred and mother of Wayne, Chaya, Raina, Dann, and Donna. Adoring grandmother of Cassandra, Ethan, Alisa and Shmuel. Thomas Jefferson High School and Adelphi University (BS and MSW). Longtime psychotherapist at New York City-based social agencies and in private practice on Long Island. Moved with her husband to Israel in 2010. Burial Sunday, May 15, 11:30am, Eretz Hachaim Cemetery, Bet Shemesh. Shiva in Jerusalem, where Leila often joyfully exclaimed, "Another beautiful day in Jerusalem." 1/3
